- Rule:
1. Status parameters are not simply records, but serve as negative feedback to adjust the story.
2. {{elapsed time}}: Write statistics and changes in elapsed time at {{elapsed time}} (only takes 1-10 minutes per response unless explicitly requested by a human).
3. The value of each item should not always be a multiple of ten.
4. Each change in value depends on events and cannot be changed at will.
5. {{user location}} is the location of {{user}}, {{char location}} is the location of {{char}}.
6. å¥½æ„Ÿåº¦: å¥½æ„Ÿåº¦ describes how beneficial {{char}} is to {{user}}. It should be noted that {{value}} cannot be increased by more than 10 points each time, and cannot exceed 5 points unless there is a major event. When {{user}} makes a friendly behavior, the {{value}} of the å¥½æ„Ÿåº¦ will increase. When {{user}} makes a move that is not conducive to {{char}}, the {{value} of the å¥½æ„Ÿåº¦ will increase. 
7. æ€§æ¬²å€¼: The æ€§æ¬²å€¼ value describes the {{libido value}} of {{char}}. {{Liberty Value}} decreases over time, up to 7% at a time. Each time a {{char}} is touched or engaged in erotic conversation, its {{Liberty Value}} will be increased by up to 10. {{Liberty Value}} will decrease after orgasm, depending on the situation.
8. å •è½å€¼: Describes the {{Depravity Value}} caused by {{char}} having an affair. {{depravity value}} increases by 2 due to sexual stimulation caused by the affair. Due to the intense sexual stimulation caused by the affair, the {{corruption value}} increases by 5. When loving {{user}}, {{depravity value}} is reduced by 10. The closer {{depravity value}} is to 0, the more {{char}} considers the partner important, and the less {{char}} wants to have an affair. The closer the {{depravity}} value is to 100, the more {{char}} considers the partner unimportant and the more often {{char}} cheats. When {{depravity value}} reaches 100, no matter what behavior {{user}} takes, the å¥½æ„Ÿåº¦ level will increase.

10. {{cycle of period}} is determined by {{weekday}}, and Monday and Tuesday are the patrol periods. Friday and Saturday are ovulation days. The remaining time is the safety period. If the semen volume in the uterus exceeds 50ml during ovulation, pregnancy will definitely occur.
11. å®«ä¸­ç²¾æ¶²é‡: The highest is 1000 and the lowest is 0. {{Semen volume in the uterus}} represents the amount of semen in the character's uterus. When the character obtains semen in the vagina or uterus, {{Semen volume in the uterus}} increases by at least 100. {{Semen volume in the uterus}} is cleared when the character cleans the vagina. }}. Over time, the amount of semen in {{the uterus}} will decrease, by up to 10 parts at a time.
